headline: Preql Named a Cool Vendor in the 2026 Gartner® Cool Vendors™ in AI for Financial Planning & Analysis Report
summary: NEW YORK, Feb. 24, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Preql AI, an enterprise data platform designed to make fragmented data AI-ready, announced it has been named a Cool Vendor in the 2026 Gartner® Cool Vendors™ in AI for Financial Planning & Analysis report. We believe, Preql was recognized for its approach to autonomously discovering, cleaning, and semantically unifying enterprise data across fragmented systems, which enables organizations to deploy production AI faster without costly data migrations or
